website_summaries.verdict: Minor quirks aside, this 5-piece bottle brush set includes versatile brushes made to clean most bottles, large and small.
pros: Pack of 5 tall, slender brushes that includes different sizes and a straw cleaner
Designed for cleaning tall bottles and other long, narrow items
Brush tops fit most narrow openings
Large brush has a bamboo handle
cons: Bristles aren't extremely firm, which may not concern all customers

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I’m so happy with this product. These brushes work great for cleaning water bottles and glass jars. I love the small brush, I went to town cleaning my metal straw set. The shipping was super fast and it came with a cute note from the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Adisha Washington

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Contigo Travel Mugs
customer_reviews.text: My soft Oxo dish brush wasn't getting my Contigo coffee mugs and smoothie holder clean, but this large bottle brush is just the perfect size and stiffness to clean them. The large brush is the one I use the most. The wooden handle didn't fit on the cup hook I use for my brushes, so I looped a bathtub chain on it and it hangs easily to dry.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! The quality is way better than expected! I even received a handmade note! I thought that was really sweet. We will be using this to clean our water bottles and our thermos.
customer_reviews.author: bryan coltrane

customer_reviews.title: Smaller brushes fit in tight spaces
customer_reviews.text: The brushes all appear sturdy and well made...The smaller two are for the tight space in the floor of my new oven so I can keep it looking new...
customer_reviews.author: MommyChicken

customer_reviews.title: As described, will use often!
customer_reviews.text: How many times while fiddling around the house have I come across some little bottle or item that I wanted to clean and use for some purpose, and couldn't because none of my brushes fit. These are perfect for those situations!
customer_reviews.author: wonder time

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality and Useful
customer_reviews.text: This set is amazing. It includes everything I want and each one is useful. Has a reasonable price and good price. I worried about the length before I purchased. But the length is perfect and long enough to apply for the bottle. Also the package is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: carolinehsu

customer_reviews.title: Too big for intended use
customer_reviews.text: These were purchased to clean my glass teapot but they are way to big to fit in the spout.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie A. Payne

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Love the different sizes of the brushes. They are long enough and slender enough for what I needed. Fast Shipping! Great seller.
customer_reviews.author: itsme

customer_reviews.title: Useful excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Quality excellent flexible to work thru bent spaces. Great for water bottles and infant water bottles. Suggest a straw cleaning diameter brush.
customer_reviews.author: Hardwareman50

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought these 2 months ago and haven't used them until now. The first time I used the large one with the wooden handle, it bent the others are flimsy too. Also there's not enough bristles at the tip to clean the bottom of the container... it's just the end of the wire touching the bottom. Terrible quality... I would return them but it's past the time to return. Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Private

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR BABY BOTTLES
customer_reviews.text: Which is probably my bad. They'd be great for cleaning out liquid bottles but anything with dirt or grime they will not be useful for. They don't scrub just scrape.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Olson

customer_reviews.title: Not for cleaning carboys
customer_reviews.text: I bought these specifically to clean antique carboys of various sizes...First of all, the brushes are not really long enough to do the job. Much to my horror, the most useful one snapped off in the jar as I tried to bend it...that blue plastic is super rigid and bend that at our peril. For a moment I thought that the brush would be in there forever but I managed to get it out. Phew! The longest brush was not useful either--the head was too big to fit into any of the carboys. The search continues for a useful set of brushes..
customer_reviews.author: GRT

customer_reviews.title: Broke after only a few uses
customer_reviews.text: I used one of the large brushes to clean my water bottle and after the second use, the brush part separated from the handle. I then used the second large brush thinking the first had been defective, and the same thing happened. I liked the length, but these are not sturdy. I cannot recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: avril

customer_reviews.title: Less is more, I'd rather have 3 sturdy brushes than 5 flimsy ones
customer_reviews.text: While bristles are reasonably firm, stems on these brushes (twisted wire) are very soft and offer very little resistance when pressed against the walls of a bottle in attempt to clean any sort of residue. Otherwise quality of assembly is pretty good. I know it's a family business and they try hard to deliver and make it very personal with "thank you" card, but I'd rather pay 10-20% more, get less brushes and spend 10 seconds cleaning each bottle rather than 1 minute. BTW, I've used many brushes in the past, these are not "keepers" for me, sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Dream&Do

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy with bristles falling out
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for bottle washing. The larger brushes did okay on larger bottles and a thermos. Mostly scratched at the coffee stains in the thermos no matter how much I swished it around the bottom and sides. The smaller brushes were extremely flimsy and left loose plastic bristles in the bottle. Dangerous! The plastic handles are just loosely screwed onto the wire stem and came off nearly every time I used them. After a few uses, the pattern of the bristles smashed and collapsed to that they don't clean well at all. Very poor quality!
customer_reviews.author: pc honey

customer_reviews.title: NOT GOOD
customer_reviews.text: ITEM BENDS EASILY MAKES IT HARD TO REACH CORNERS. THE BRISTLES BEND SO JUST SCRATCHES DOESN'T CLEAN. THE WOOD HANDLE ONE IS THE WORSE SO FLIMSY. ONLY GOOD THING IS THE LENGTH AND THE THINNEST BRUSH IT CAN GO INTO STRAWS UT SHOULD BE LONGER.
customer_reviews.author: DENEANE SANTILLANO

customer_reviews.title: These are big cleaning brushes for a variety of bottle sizes!
customer_reviews.text: These bottle brushes are for my reusable water bottles and they are perfect! Long enough. Wide enough. And sturdy. They arrived very quickly and with a hand written note from the vendor that was very cute! Looking forward to putting them to good use!
customer_reviews.author: KC Ohio

customer_reviews.title: Finally - Great Brushes
customer_reviews.text: Didn't expect to be excited by bottle brushes, but these are great! Been struggling to fine ones long enough for hummingbird feeder, and sturdy enough to hold a bend around the curves. These are perfect! Also with all the sizes in the package, three of them have already been put to use in the kitchen. Great product! UPDATE: It's official, used all of them. Still the best brushes I have bought. Really work well with stainless travel mugs, fantastic for hummingbird cleaner, truly great product.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this product as it is exactly what I was expecting and very useful. I particularly like the fact that they are designed to make the end of them useful as well. So many other products have nothing at the end which makes cleaning the bottom impossible without another tool
customer_reviews.author: Debra L. Kjos

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Previously tried to write a review and it was blocked because I mentioned they're giving a *card containing currency to spend at this website 😏* for five star reviews. So something to keep in mind when you're reading all the glowing reviews. They're cheaply made and are labeled "made in China". Some of the handles have bristles melted into them which speaks of quality control. The bristles aren't packed very densely so it mostly scraped the mess around rather than cleaning the inside of my bottles and the handles are flimsy so you aren't able to use much pressure without bending them. I'm probably going to find a different brush set that has a sponge or something.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Junk - two brushes broke after second use
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why this product has so many good reviews. The second time we tried to use these brushes to clean glass bottles, the handles broke off and left the brushes stuck inside our bottles. Pieces of junk - dont waste your money on these.
customer_reviews.author: Chappy

customer_reviews.title: Good for many uses
customer_reviews.text: Great for cleaning my water bottles that I carry around during the day. My husband uses the smaller ones for his hummingbird feeders and they work very well. Many uses for these versatile brushes.
customer_reviews.author: emily m. holton

customer_reviews.title: Well made brushes.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice set of brushes. They have sturdy handles but the handles can be bent some to better access some items. I particular wanted a brush to clean my narrow necked olive oil bottles. The 15" short bristle brush cleans it nicely. The brush fits thru the small neck easily & the end of the brush can be slightly bent which allows access to the bottom corners of the bottle without scratching the bottle. The bristles on the larger brushes are just the right amount of stiffness & the handles are sturdy enough not to bend too easily. Overall, a very handy well made set of brushes that should meet all my bottle cleaning needs.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Dog LadyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Does an outstanding job quickly!
customer_reviews.text: These worked great for exactly what I bought them for, which was cleaning chimneys on oil lamps. Although not specifically designed or advertised for that it does a great job on both my Aladdin lamps and regular flat wick oil lamps. I have 5, soon to be six, and it takes mere minutes to clean them all which, as anyone who has and uses them on a regular basis knows, you have to do every few days to keep them sparkling clean for maximum light and heat output. I also like the fact that I’m supporting a small family owned and run business.
customer_reviews.author: Vanns40

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to like them
customer_reviews.text: Having moved away from using one time use plastics we use reusable water bottles a lot that often need cleaning. My last bottle brush broke so I needed a new one. These just didn't do the job I thought they would. The handles/stems on the brush were to flimsy and did not give you any force behind your cleaning. It felt like you were barely scrubbing the inside of the bottle. It felt like it was just lightly swishing the brush around the inside of the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Every Size Bottle Brush You Will Ever Need!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great product! I am thrilled to at last have every type of bottle brush I'll ever need. Small one is great for straws. Long bottle brush is perfect for cleaning the turkey baster with ease. The Other brushes are great for water bottles, etc. etc. I am very pleased with my purchase, I have been looking forever to find something to clean the turkey baster and these brushes do the job. Sturdy, easy to use on my bottles, salad containers, oil and vinegar bottles, I highly, recommend this quality product for your kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Linn Random

customer_reviews.title: Handy Brushes for Hard to Reach Places!
customer_reviews.text: I decided to finally buy some brushes like this to clean my coffee decanters and Chemex coffee maker since it is very difficult to clean with a regular sponge. These are fantastic! Not too coarse, but not too soft that they don't give a good scrubbing. They have a good amount of flex so that the brush can contour to whatever it is that you need to clean. The smallest brush is also really good for cleaning out coffee from the nooks and crannies of my burr grinder. The special touch is that the brushes came with a handwritten note from the owner of the company. Highly recommend these brushes!!
customer_reviews.author: Daryl Shook

customer_reviews.title: These Do the Job
customer_reviews.text: I need some long brushes to get into water bottles. It looked like there was mold on the bottom of the stainless steal (I had to Google to see if that was even possible and it is). As you can see, the various sizes of the brushes allowed me to get in and get rid of whatever was on the bottom. These aren't the highest quality brushes, but they absolutely do the job and the price was right for a complete set. For as often as they get used, I'm sure they'll last a while. And as others said, the thank you note from the vendor was a really nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: LPF

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: These brushes are very nice quality. Some brushes you get seem sparse in the bristles but these brushes are pretty full and clean baby bottles, water bottles, and jars very nicely
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Rust after just a few months
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this product. I love supporting small businesses like this one operating within Amazon's marketplace but these brushes honestly are not that good. They are flimsy and not very sturdy but my biggest issue is that after just a few months of use many of them have started rusting!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Best flexible brushes!!!
customer_reviews.text: These brushes are extra long, you receive a bunch of different sizes and they are flexible! Needed them for my oversized water jug. They reach every nook and cranny to get at those hard to reach places. (The small brush reaches inside the handle of my jug and the big brush reaches the large corner at the bottome) So glad I came across these! & the personalized note was an extra nice and appreciated touch. Highly recommend these brushes and the sellers ❤
customer_reviews.author: O. Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Trash
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t like sturdiness. I thought the larger would be sturdier at least for washing canning jars. Today’s brushes are pretty worthless. Tossed them all. Back to grilling fork scratcher and rag. Would of just tossed and let go but you bugged me for a review. Here it is. Trash.
customer_reviews.author: B CB

customer_reviews.title: Buy these they are Awesome 👏🏻
customer_reviews.text: These brushes are well made and I really like them for cleaning the coffee tumblers! Speedy fast delivery also. Very pleasant company.
customer_reviews.author: ADRIENNE O.

customer_reviews.title: WELL MADE - GREAT SERVICE
customer_reviews.text: I know these are simply bottle washers, however, I've had the cheap versions and these are well made so the tips don't come off and they don't bend to become unusable. These are worth the price which isn't bad. The set is well thought and will be useful for most things one would need these for. Glad I used this vendor and product.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley Werr

customer_reviews.title: Still searching...
customer_reviews.text: PROS: -- It's great that all of the brushes needed are in one package. They're long enough to reach to the bottom for my needs. CONS: -- All of the brushes twist within their handles. When the brush is inside a bottle, trying to clean a bottle side to side by twisting the handle does nothing other than turn the handle. These brushes can only be used with an in-out motion. -- None of the brushes have nearly as many bristles at the end of the brush as shown in the product images so cleaning the bottom of a bottom isn't much more than scaping the bottom with the end of the wire handle.
customer_reviews.author: Mark P.

customer_reviews.title: Great brush set!
customer_reviews.text: I love these tools for cleaning out my fountain kitty water dish and my water bottle and basically anything that needs this type of brush tool to clean it. They are bigger than I expected but was pleasantly surprised..they are strong enough to put some pressure when moving up and down to clean things. I also like that the set does come with a small brush that would fit in straws. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a nice brush set to clean inside bottles or long spaces in items needing some cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Great variety of brushes
customer_reviews.text: I’m finding lots of handy uses for these brushes. Decently made, the one with the wood handle bent a little bit but for the price they do the job!
customer_reviews.author: Janice Willow

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Brushes
customer_reviews.text: I hang these brushes inside the door of the cabinet under my kitchen sink. They are perfect for cleaning my 24 oz. Contigo and various dishes with odd nooks and crannies. The blue matches my kitchen perfectly. They're easy to clean, too. After use, pour a bit of dish soap onto them, and wash out with hot water. They are still as white and clean as the day I got them. My only issue is that only one of the brushes--the largest one--has bristles at the tip of the brush. I wish more had bristles on the tip as well as the sides. But other than that, these brushes are amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Too large for Grolsch bottles
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these specifically because in description they are good for cleaning "Kombucha and beer supplies." I had to use vice grips to crush the metal that the worthless plastic bristles are in just to get it in the neck of a Grolsch bottle (most often used for beer brewing and Kombucha brews). Then it wouldn't come back out! Was contemplating breaking the bottle but vice grips saved the situation, again. These do not work in specific items as advertised. The point going into the bottle first is way too large. Waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: ethoffman

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Great set !! Most impressed with quality and value for money - wow!! Compared to all the other brush sets on amazon, I took a chance on this one since it seemed so ample (Almost too good to be true). Wow - it is true - highly recommend this brush cleaner set. The smaller brushed are great for the nooks and crannies of doctor brown inserts etc., which I also use. Thank you!!! And yes, the thank you note was beautiful and much appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: Jam

customer_reviews.title: Okay, but two larger brushes need work
customer_reviews.text: These brushes are okay. I find the largest brush to be a let down. It's the one that has bristles on the end that I can use for cleaning cups. I find the bristles on the two largest brushes to be severely lacking in firmness. They become bent apon the first few uses and don't clean as well now. A baby bottle brush I had before was better.. As for the other three smaller brushes the firmness is perfect and they have worked well for me, no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: No bristles on the top of most brushes!
customer_reviews.text: This set has one major disadvantage...there is no real material on the tip of the brush, making it hard to clean bottom of larger bottles. You end up scraping the metal wire support since there aren't bristles by the top. Looks much better in the photo that they provide, but brushes aren't like that in reality. Only the largest brush has a decent amount of bristles on top, but of course, it doesn't fit in most bottles that needed to be cleaned.
customer_reviews.author: Kev Om

customer_reviews.title: Complete crap
customer_reviews.text: Absolute crap, very hard plastic bristles that don’t soften with water, dish soap just falls right off it making it completely useless in washing anything. Waste of time because you’ll spend double or triple the time washing one bottle and waste of product because you have to keep adding dish soap every time you take the brush out of bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Anonym0us

customer_reviews.title: Finally a good set of brushes!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking a set of brushes that will clean all the different types of bottles and vases we have in our home. I like the fact that you can bend these to fit any shape that you need. These work great for the sports bottles that teenagers who leave drink to spoil in the bottle. Ugh. I also used these to clean my humming bird feeders. I will say the straw cleaner works AWESOME fitting down into the flower tubes of the hummingbird feeder. Have really enjoyed these brushes so far. P.S. shipping was fast and they arrived just as described.
customer_reviews.author: michelle Parrish

customer_reviews.title: Useful set of brushes
customer_reviews.text: I've used these for cleaning various bottles, etc, and am very satisfied. Yes, they are just bristles in twisted wire, so if not used carefully, they will bend...if you want a "won't bend" brush, get a toilet brush or a solvent tank brush...but good luck trying to clean a metal or glass drinking straw, an eye dropper, a narrow necked bottle, or a little CBD tincture bottle with one. Used with a little care, these will clean just about anything. The enclosed "handwritten" note was also a nice customer service touch. If you're ham-handed, don't buy these. If you can use a tad bit of care when using, you should be satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Tom B

customer_reviews.title: Family owned company
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected! Great product! Very sweet for them to send a thank you card with the purchase. It personalizes things for you and it’s nice to know that it’s a family owned business that cares enough to send thank you’s with your purchase! Very sweet for them to send a thank you card with the purchase. It personalizes things for you and it’s nice to know that it’s a family owned business that cares enough to send thank you‘s with your purchase
customer_reviews.author: Pamela C. Mcbride

customer_reviews.title: Great selection of bottle brushes
customer_reviews.text: I use a bottlebrush a lot, mostly for keeping my hummingbird feeders clean and for getting the residue out of my coffee grinder parts before putting them in the dishwasher. I especially like a slender brush for some jobs. My old one was getting loose at the handle and I figured it was time for a new one. This assortment had several useful designs and sizes. The part that impressed me most was the looks-like hand-written thank-you note enclosed in the package. Our society could use more class and good graces like this.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Tellefsen

customer_reviews.title: I love these!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best bottle brushes I have used in a long time! I use them to clean mason jars since I can’t fit my hand into them. I also use them to clean bottles which work very well! I love that it came with different sizes. One really long thin one, and a medium shorter one that I haven’t found a use for them just yet, a small one that I use for the bottle nipples, and two large ones that I use for cleaning mason jars, bottles and everything else. I’ve used them for almost three weeks everyday and they are lasting much longer then the cheap dollar ones from Walmart and dollar tree.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Great Variety For Every Bottle, Cup, and Straw
customer_reviews.text: These brushes are great! Between me and my three young kids we have baby bottles, breast pump bottles, sippy cups, reusable straws, water bottles, and coffee tumbles. Compared to the average baby bottle brush the bristles are thicker and more sturdy, the handles are longer and are made with a thick wire allowing them to flex or bend. The straw brush allows me to clean the rubber no leak stoppers in my kids sippy cups and straws. These brushes have even gone beyond our home and to the farm. They have made scrubbing through the milk residue on calf bottles, goat bottles, and even some of our dairy farms milking equipment so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine P.

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to clean my kombucha bottles. I really only wanted one or two good brushes, but the price on these were about the same as others, so I went ahead and bought them. I have had no issues at all using these and I really like them. The largest brush wont fit in ,y bottles because the wire is bent into a horizontal circle. I don't mind this at all because I still have two brushes that do what I need them to. I have been really pleases with the quality of these and would recommend them to you.
customer_reviews.author: Lucky Lee

customer_reviews.title: More versatile and effective than much pricier name brand bottle brushes
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t yet found a use for every brush, but they have definitely filled all of my needs. I am a bartender and I bought these for use at work; they are better at getting into small bottle openings and reaching all of the hard to reach corners at the bottom and around the inside of the neck than anything else I’ve used. I love that this is a family owned small business as well, I was really impressed by the handwritten note that they sent with my package.
customer_reviews.author: K. Davis

customer_reviews.title: They basically do the job, but rounded brushes not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set because the two big brushes had rounded bottoms and I wanted to clean flower vases. The ones I received, one is kind of round at the bottom, the other the wire is at the bottom and the brushes go backwards. So the one with the wire and he brushes going backwards just scrapes on the bottom of the vase...does not clean the bottom of the vases at all. The one which is slightly rounded kind of works but won't fit into some of the vases; the one with the wire that scratches the bottom does fit. Otherwise, they are as described, work, and obviously made in chine...will see how long they stay together.
customer_reviews.author: TexasDude

customer_reviews.title: Even the kids will do the dishes
customer_reviews.text: I loved these bottle brushes. All the different sizes are perfect for all of our different bottles and straws we have. As a family of 7 we have a lot of bottles and straws that need cleaning each day. With these my kids even help do the dishes. The bristles are nice and get into the small locations that a sponge can’t go. The handle is nice and sturdy while wire shaft can bend to go through things but dont break.
customer_reviews.author: Katerina

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy handles are great. I feel like lots of times with these brushes, they bend too much at the handle and you can't get any good cleaning going. Not the case with these. Sturdy and clean well. Easy to clean the brushes themselves too.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: A Set of Brushes for Clean Bottle Flushes
customer_reviews.text: We used this to clean some oddly shaped older bottles found on our property. Since these bottles have shoulders , they are difficult to clean. The brushes did a pretty good job on these bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Tad Simons

customer_reviews.title: Convenient for breast pumping products and etc.
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I needed. I use this to clean my baby’s bottles and breast pump products. It was a little hard trying to get into the nooks and crannies of the breast pump lids and such, before buying this. With the small pipe cleaner, it definitely helps thoroughly everything. What I don’t like is the way the big bristles form after washing something, but I also think it might be from the way I scrub everything. After each use, I brush it within my hand and sort of form it back to it’s original state. They also had a small, little hand-written note inside the bag. It was nice. Overall, I am pleased. Thank you Jess.
customer_reviews.author: C.

customer_reviews.title: FAST delivery, high QUALITY product, FAMILY owned business.
customer_reviews.text: This set is absolutely perfect. I am using it to clean out lamb baby bottles and I'm just so thankful how well they work and how FAST they came in the mail. Also, there was a hand written note thanking me, from the family of the business. I thought that was sweet. I'm glad to be using a product that is supporting real people! And a good product at that! Thank you so much from my little lamb and me <3
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Great set to have on hand
customer_reviews.text: I was in desperate need of brushes in varying sizes that were resilient but also somewhat flexible so I could clean out my window air conditioning units. These brushes definitely fit the bill. The small one was the perfect size for getting into small crevices and the second smallest brush that was longer really got tough to reach places while doing a good job on the toughest spots. I’m glad I have a good cleaning brush set on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Works great for all nooks and crannies.
customer_reviews.text: I hesitated to buy another bottle brush since I already own about 7 or 8. But yet, I couldn’t find one that worked for my 1 galloon water bottle. It was really hard to get the bottom clean, the handle inside and the ledge on the top since it’s not a cylinder. If you bend the pieces you can get to all of the places. The long thin one actually works in the handle of the 1 gallon water bottle as well.
customer_reviews.author: time for fun

customer_reviews.title: PERFECTION!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for and the delivery and time was superbly effective! Quickest delivery I have experienced this year! I thank you for your precision to details and will be back to purchase from You again, in the near future! If any of you like a product from this seller ... I would strongly recommend you to purchase the product you like! You will not regret it. Consider this seller "WORLD CLASS" and will not do you wrong. :-D
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: not the best for Dr brown bottles
customer_reviews.text: Ok so these brushes are really well made and I'm sure they're great for LOTS of stuff, but I wouldn't say they're my favorite for baby bottles. None of the brushes are able to clean the very bottom of the bottle very well. I ended up just buying a cheap bottle brush from Walmart so I could clean my bottles. The straw cleaner works great for cleaning the insert for the dr brown bottles though, and also my yeti straws!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised with these brushes. After opening the box and looking at them I was skeptical. They don’t look like they’d clean milk out of a cup. But I will tell you, with very little effort they remove coffee build up in your metal coffee cups like a charm. If you’re like my dad, you’d be cringing knowing all that flavor was gone. Get them. Great price and your helping a small business.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnalynn Beal

customer_reviews.title: Great Brushes!
customer_reviews.text: Had to reorder again because the small blue handle brush I use everyday handle cracked. I also had the wooden handle come off one of the large brushes too. I would prefer a plastic handle instead of a wooden one, too bulky. The plastic handle on the small blue brush needs to be more sturdy! Otherwise, pretty good brushes though handles could be sturdier. I would reorder again.
customer_reviews.author: Lotus Jew

customer_reviews.title: Great little brushes!
customer_reviews.text: Set of 5 bottle brushes, assorted sizes, arrived today - with a handwritten thank you card from the vendor. (How very nice!) Brushes appear to be very well made and durable. Just used one for the task which prompted the order: Cleaning the bathroom sink drain. Worked perfectly!!! I expect the other sizes will come in quite handy from time to time. Great little brushes!!!
customer_reviews.author: J David

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile product
customer_reviews.text: I live in Louisiana, where anything wet is going to have MOLD growing in it. These scrubbers are wonderful - they get into all the little crevices where mold likes to hide. Great for all types of cleaning, especially my humidifier and dehumidifier. The thin brush was an excellent tool for cleaning the hummingbird feeders, too. Highly recommend this product. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Niki V.

customer_reviews.title: very helpful
customer_reviews.text: Have a lot of items that need a variety of brushes to clean. I feed hummingbirds all year long, so, need great brushes to clean out their nectar holders every few days. These are very helpful. Plus, the larger sizes, clean the item I use to make, store their nectar in. I also use them to help clean my humidifier. Sweet hand written thank you note came with the items.
customer_reviews.author: VeeBee

customer_reviews.title: Love the variety but there are some cons
customer_reviews.text: Pros: very long brushes and handles, holes on the ends so they can be hung on a hook. Cons: they're not really rounded on the ends so I have a hard time getting the bottoms of bottles clean, the bristles on all the brushes are very stiff so I am apprehensive to use them on anything plastic or acrylic for fear that my bottles will eventually be etched with scratches.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Gammill

customer_reviews.title: Thin wire running through the metal not very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Sorry did not like your product returned thin wire to the middle very little bristles very flimsy could not use to wash a bottle
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: These are just ok, there are better bottle brushes out there. Cleaning the sides of the bottles is easy but getting the bottom of the bottle is difficult with these because they’re metal and the bristles splay out from the end so your just rubbing the bottom of the bottle with metal....
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Family owned business that cares
customer_reviews.text: First off, this is a great brush set that fits loads of different bottle types which is fantastic. Second, we received a hand written note in our packaging, thanking us for our business and let me tell you what, that was the sweetest thing. I work for a company that’s goal is to help empower the underdogs (ie small businesses) and I’m glad I got to support this one.
customer_reviews.author: Kylie

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I have a 6 month old & have tried many different bottle cleaners. We use Dr. Brown's bottle, so the tiny cleaner is perfect for the small parts & tube kf the bottles. Its actually better than the brush that comes with the bottles. The bigger brushe sizes work great on everything.... vases, flasks, bottles, water bottles &even just as quick bowl swipe. They're sturdy enough & also flexible enough for everything I need them for. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Nichole Gates

customer_reviews.title: Don't Clean the Bottom Well
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to clean baby bottles and storage containers (so things that hold milk anywhere from one hour to several months). I need them to be fully clean. These brushes don't really have bristles on the tips so it's basically IMPOSSIBLE to clean things properly. I have to go in with a second brush or sponge just to make sure the bottom of the bottles/containers don't have any milk residue. I would imagine a similar issue would occur in reusable water bottles but people probably don't notice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat disapointed
customer_reviews.text: I am somewhat disappointed with how easily the brush handles will bend when I'm using the to wash dishes and tumblers. I really like the straw brush and the smaller brush however the length of the wire handles and the way they bend so easily makes it very difficult to wash dishes efficiently.
customer_reviews.author: Frannie Fran

customer_reviews.title: The sweetest company
customer_reviews.text: I bought these thinking I was just getting a product on amazon for something simple. Nothing major. Little did I know I was supporting this sweet company. They didn’t just send the product but there was also a very sweet handwritten thank you card. Who does that??? It was so sweet As for the product itself, it works fantastic (and I wouldn’t say that if it didn’t). It does what it’s supposed to do and is quite sturdy. You can bend it to get into certain spaces. It maintains it shape well
customer_reviews.author: dav28

customer_reviews.title: Brushes are Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this complement of brushes and am not disappointed. They seem to be well made and sturdy and having multiple sizes is a great benefit. I use these for cleaning portable house fans, to get into the dryer vent and remove dust bunnies that get lodged in by the screen. The larger brushes are great for scrubbing the inside of insulated bottles too. This is a great product for the purchase price.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmie Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Good value !
customer_reviews.text: I have to say upon receipt, they were better than I thought. Also it contained a hand written thank you note. The fact that someone took the time to write that, was impressive for me. Not sure where they are made and I do love to support US and family owned business. Nonetheless for the value and what you get, I'm pretty happy at the start.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Well made.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good set. The largest has a loop for hanging...the rest I have to figure out where to store them. Well made, effective and soit goes. When cleaning bottles, however, things can get stuck in the bottoms (caked on things from smoothies to diatomaceous earth...the top of the bottle brush isn’t completely covered with extra brushes but is metal, so a little extra examination is necessary to be sure I got it clean. Otherwise, very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Ziggy3339

customer_reviews.title: Great Product at an amazing price!
customer_reviews.text: This bottle cleaner kit is honestly all you will ever need to properly wash your bottles and sipping cups!! The handles are easy to grip and hold onto and non slippery which is a major plus!! The bristles are firm but not harsh and easy to insert into both bottles and supply cups and are great and scrubbing and fitting into hard to get grooves of the bottles and cups! This is a fantastic set that I am so glad I took a chance on getting!! I’m definitely going to recommend these to my sisters!!
customer_reviews.author: HappyMommy

customer_reviews.title: Not useful for my needs
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. These brushes are not terrible, but their ends are not really 'full', the bristles are a bit sparse. So, makes it hard to clean slightly stubborn stains. For example, I eat overnight oats from Mason jars every day, and, getting the oats wasn't easy with these brushes. I didn't find them useful, so, I got a different one made of silicone instead.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful brush set for great price
customer_reviews.text: This brush set is beautiful. I love the thick, wooden handel on the biggest one. I also really appreciate the strength of the bristles! They're really strong and help get crud off of hard to reach areas. My only concern is how easily bendable the wire connecting the bristles to the handles are. At the moment it's great for helping reach those particularly difficult spots but I'm worried it will snap in two. So far everything is great and I would definitely recommend, especially for the price :)
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal & Quality
customer_reviews.text: This brush set is exactly what I’ve been looking for. I have bought several sets in the past and they have failed first time or soon after. I used this set very successfully on one of the hardest items to clean, a Ships Decanter. It had Porta stains inside on the bottom outside edges. I was very successful. After the cleaning was finished, the brushes were of the same quality as when they first came out of the package and continue to preform perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: R D Banks

customer_reviews.title: Not for narrow top bottles
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for 12/16 oz craft brewing bottle cleaners; do not pick these. These are for wider mouth jars and bottles (like baby bottles although so stiff I'd worry about them damaging plastic). They are very sturdy and will clean most things but not for regular brewing bottles you use for kombucha, kefir water, cider, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: So far these brushes seem to be amazing quality at a great price. I've only used the large brush to clean water bottles, but love how much sturdier it is than other brushes I've used, which seems to get the bottles much cleaner than other brushes (and much easier to use and reach all areas of the bottle). Equally amazing was the actual handwritten note that came with the product. Seriously, nobody goes that extra step anymore, and I found it extremely refreshing and admirable.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Makes Cleaning So Much Easier!
customer_reviews.text: Love these brushes! I used the straw brush, worried it wouldn’t be long enough, but it was! It was so easy to clean with. Straws, glasses, water bottles, all of it! I used a couple brushes strictly for cleaning my cats’ water fountain bowl. They made the job so much easier! I was able to use each brush at least a couple times. Different sizes for different jobs. I had to hang them on my kitchen wall just to have easy access to them.
customer_reviews.author: Harlie D

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Not like in picture. The ends are bigger than the stem of the brush so you can't fit it into small bottles. Ya know, the kind you need a bottle brush for. The advertising photos do not show this. I'm sure they work fine for larger bottle openings but I bought them specifically for the set of bottles I use that have smaller openings
customer_reviews.author: Melissa C.

customer_reviews.title: Love this brush set!
customer_reviews.text: I am loving my new brush set. Every member of my family has different sport bottles. I now have the right brush for all of them. These brushes easily clean what my dishwasher can’t seem to reach. Until now, baby bottles and sippy cups were a real hassle to clean but not anymore. I sweep right through them. The brushes seem to get into even the tightest of spots. I also found that the #3 and 4 brushes easily clean the hard to reach areas of my oven. I give this brush set a 10+.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Dean

customer_reviews.title: Got the job done. Arrived a day early
customer_reviews.text: Product was used to clean small spaces in soft style window treatments. The brushes served our purpose and the remaining brushes will be put to good use. They are sturdy and we'll made
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Proietti

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for hard to reach cleaning needs
customer_reviews.text: The 1" brushes are perfect for cleaning a part of my vaporizer that does not get cleaned with the manufacturer's instructions. Having bristles at the end lets me get into corners, and the brush is neither too soft to clean nor too stiff to flex when needed. A good product, and I appreciate that the actual dimensions are provided in the description on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: fantasy fanatic

customer_reviews.title: Great Bottle Brushes
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these bottle brushes to clean out a couple of hummingbird feeders that had mold in them. I was able to get the second to largest one to fit into the bottle to scrub the sides with. It worked well and I was able to get our hummingbird feeder back into commission which resulted some happy late-season birds that hadn't started their migration yet. Although I haven't tried it yet, I will use the brushes to clean out my cycling bottles and bladder when they get dirty. They are the right size and will take the hassle out of cleaning and will be much easier than my current washcloth and butter knife method... Happy scrubbing!
customer_reviews.author: Michael L. Babb

customer_reviews.title: Great and Unique Set!
customer_reviews.text: The set has been amazing! There is one long skinny brush that I use to clean drains (I have long hair, okay?) There is a brush to clean straws which has been a lifesaver since my poor stainless steel yeti straws have been so hard to clean. The brush is sturdy but also very flexible to get in the hard to reach spots. The biggest bottle brush was by far my favorite item. When cleaning my sons sippy cups with a general bottle brush the bristles never reach the bottom surface of the cup. This brush has bristles that fill the entire end so it gets the bottom as well. Definitely a great and unique set!
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT FOR CLEANING HARD TO REACH ITEMS
customer_reviews.text: loved these brushes, very well made and do the trick! they also will bend a mold a little to reach those hard to clean areas! I have glass vases and no matter what I used I couldn't get dirt out - until these brushes came! Thanks and will buy again! :)
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Disposable brushes.
customer_reviews.text: The longest brush didn't fit in a glass beer bottle. All of the plastic handles broke after a few weeks. The metal is starting to rust. It's a good brush if you plan to throw it away after a few uses. The brush itself cleans well. I definitely would not recommend this to any restaurant or food industry. You get what you pay for in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Hawaii

customer_reviews.title: Blue plastic handle fell off brush within first week of use
customer_reviews.text: I bought the set for the two smallest brushes to clean baby bottles and pump parts. The blue plastic handle on the next to smallest sized brush fell off within the first week of light use. The smallest brush is small enough to clean straws and little nooks in bottles/pump parts and seems to be of great quality; it has a fully metal handle and the nylon bristles are softer than the other brushes. I will keep the set for the smallest brush, but I will likely toss the rest of the brushes.
customer_reviews.author: AllyW

customer_reviews.title: Cleaning on a whole nother level
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much every possible brush you might need. I hand wash our water bottles and sippy cups so they last longer, along with kitchen appliances and always need a steady supply of brushes of different shapes and sizes. Hubby says I take it to a whole nother level but I just really hate anything dirty when it comes to ingesting food or drink. These are fantastic and I especially like the wooden handle one.
customer_reviews.author: Lexus

customer_reviews.title: Thoroughly clean bottles, would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these three days ago and they arrived yesterday, and I am very happy with the product! The bristles on the brush are firm and clean my 40oz hydroflask very well. I am able to move around and clean all around the inside of my bottle which is nice. Also, a handwritten thank you note came with the order, and it was nice to see rather than a generic printed card that most businesses send out.
customer_reviews.author: Mari Quiroz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I need😁
customer_reviews.text: Love this!!..perfect for my needs 😁 We use several types of water bottles and it was difficult to clean them... neck was too narrow, container was too long for a regular bottle brush. I bought a brush from another store and it wasn't long enough. This product is perfect for what I need. Arrived very quickly sealed in a plastic bag. 5 sizes of brushes to clean everything! No problem getting to the bottom of all sizes of bottles, there's even a brush to clean the reusable straws! Thanks Jess and team for a quality product..😁
customer_reviews.author: cheryl keeneysachs

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: I love all the different sizes that come in this package. It was well package and you have a different size for whatever you need. It even has a straw cleaner. The larger brushes I use to clean my hummingbird feeder work great. Great product and the seller sends a personal hand written card inside the package. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Athena

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Extremely cheap! The brush shafts are made of braided aluminum which bend when you use them so they really aren’t doing much good, and they are made of the cheapest crap material I’ve ever seen in my life. Complete waste of money. DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.author: AmazonUser

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: I looked at all the local stores but they just didn't have what I needed. This is a kit of everything you might need to clean various items around your home or shop. The brushes are well made and I also appreciated the handwritten thank you note. Small businesses are the backbone of BUY IN AMERICA. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Perpetual dieter

customer_reviews.title: Nice brush selection; impressive quality;  refreshing/reassuring concern for customers!
customer_reviews.text: As advertised and seen in other customer photos They are long enough and flexible enough, and the bristles sufficiently stiff, to clean all the difficult-to-reach places, and debris, in the various containers, tubes, and places I bought them for. And ditto the comments from others regarding the handwritten note inside-- that was a first-time ever experience for me too and I wish them success in their endeavors! Would like to know if they manufacture anything else [certainly would give them first consideration on future orders for things I need!].
customer_reviews.author: elhadden

product_meta.title: Bottle Brush Cleaner 5 Pack - Long Water Bottle and Straw Cleaning Brush - Kitchen Wire Scrub Set for Washing, Wine Decanter, Baby, Kombucha, Pipes, Hydro Flask Tumbler, Sinks, Beer Brewing Supplies
feature_bullets: ✔ ASSORTED SIZE CLEANING BRUSHES #1 Extra Long Length Large Bamboo Handle Bottle Brush (15.5" x 2.5") kitchen bottle brush, #2 Long Bottle (15.5" x 2.5") for narrow neck bottle / #3 Narrow Long ( 15.5" X 1"), #4 Short Baby Bottle Brush (9.8" x .8") + Straw Cleaning Brush

✔ BEST VALUE - Versatile wholesale bottle brush set cleaning kit for baby bottles including Avent bottles, kombucha and beer brewing bottles, wine and carboy decantor, sports water bottles, spiral glass pipe and weed smoking bong, and bathroom sinks

✔ BPA FREE stiff nylon bristle long pipe cleaners for cleaning and scrubbing in your home and kitchen. A best gift ideas for new moms in 2020 or upcoming stocking stuffers for women, bottle brushes are dishwasher friendly sized small, medium, large.

✔ STIFF SCRUBBING bottle brush pipe cleaners for bulk scrubbing & cleaning your Water HydroFlask Tumbler, Boon, Munchkin, Playtex, rTic, Simple Modern, Yeti, Narrow Neck Swell / S'well, Thermos, Hummingbird Feeders, Ello, Ozark, Contigo, Hydro Flask

✔ MONEY BACK GUARANTEE - Our bottle brushes for cleaning are the perfect glass scrubbers. Wine bottle brush / waterbottle brush for small necks and tall handles. Compatible for blenders, water bottles and Nalgenes.
